Applications:
2009 to 2013 Chevrolet Silverado and GMC Sierra 1500 with a 5.3L Flex Fuel V8 engine and fits the Crew Cab with a 5.5 ft. bed and Extra Cab with a 6.5 ft. bed configuration. Also fits 2007 to 2008 Chevrolet Silverado and GMC Sierra 1500 with a 4.8L or 5.

Features:
The current generation of Chevrolet Silverado and GMC Sierra trucks have become known for their durability and efficiency - the perfect application for Flowmaster's new Cat-Back Exhaust System. This easy to install system fits 2007-2013 GM 1/2 Ton trucks equipped with 5.3L V8 engines in all wheelbase configurations except for standard cab, longbed. Manufactured using durable 409S stainless steel and backed by our 10-year limited warranty, the system features a Super 50 Series single in/dual out muffler that exits through dual 2.50" mandrel bent tailpipes.  Both side and rear exit pipes are included in the system so the customer can choose the desired final exhaust exit location. The system is finished off with attractive 3.00" diameter polished stainless steel, logo embossed tips that tell the world you're packing high performance. As a Force II system it provides improved horsepower, mileage and torque along with a deep, moderate exterior sound level and mild interior tone. Flowmaster products have long been known for their best in the industry fitment, and are supplied with easy to follow instructions and all the necessary hardware for simple no-special-tools-required bolt-in installation.

✓ Mandrel bent 16 gauge 409 stainless tubing
✓ Moderate exterior exhaust tone
✓ Includes hangers and hardware for easy installation
✓ Dyno tuned for maximum performance
✓ Made in the USA
✓ Premium Flowmaster quality
